body: Please provide a demo.

> 无法复现，请提供操作的浏览器及操作系统环境

@Ovilia http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=x3Mizu7x8l&v=4

渲染过程的存在是因为渲染需要好几秒完成，如果白屏很久的话体验不是很好，所以现在不支持没有渲染过程的效果。
不支持缩放拖拽，欢迎 PR。

1. Set [showSymbol](http://www.echartsjs.com/option.html#series-line.showSymbol) to be false
2. Set [sampling](http://www.echartsjs.com/option.html#series-line.sampling) to be `'average'`
Try mark points?
i found when i set label.show to true and not set linestyle, the graph is lucency.

See https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/pull/8759/files
Try `'insideLeft'` and `'insideRight'`.
Please provide a demo.

@100pah Please have a review.

Also, should those disabled legends have a default difference in appearance? Like opacity?
OK. That seems to be a bug.

Thanks for reply. As I mentioned before, disable scale the graphic elements when appending new data and keep scrolling along the X axis available.

### Here are demos:

#### Expected Behavior:
![1544512820271](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7347183/49784711-2cc7ac00-fd59-11e8-8903-ce2e3e43fa0a.gif)

#### Current Behavior:
![1544513049032](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7347183/49784748-4bc63e00-fd59-11e8-85bf-5b0cc80a26b1.gif)

In the second demo, graphic elements was shrunk after appending data. The first shows that graphic elements will keep the fixed size, it's a common scene in candlestick. 

How to implement the feature as the first demo shows when using candlestick and dataset?

Thx.

> I think you can try the `appendData` method.
> http://echarts.baidu.com/api.html#echartsInstance.appendData

In fact,  the doc gives the attention: 目前并非所有的图表都支持分片加载时的增量渲染。目前支持的图有：ECharts 基础版本的 散点图（scatter） 和 线图（lines）。ECharts GL 的 散点图（scatterGL）、线图（linesGL） 和 可视化建筑群（polygons3D）。

> 我也遇到图表更新时尾迹遗留的问题，请问你解决了嘛

not yet.

> This is due to the implementation of the comet-tail effect. Because it needs to blend with previous frames, it is not possible to remain the previous result when set new data.

so what can i do? 😂

本人使用2D散点图当做3D地球的baseTexture，但是发现当散点图铺到地球上时散点的tooltip无效了。请问怎么解决？具体见示例
http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xIuMf_y4sj
tooltip不支持canvas里的tooltip，你可以吧你init对象变成div。但根据你的需求我觉得你直接用scatter3d就好，在option里设置tooltip就好了
@pauturvalles Simply sort the array of data before you hand it off to Echarts.
新版本的Echarts似乎解决这个问题了

示例如下
http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xIuMf_y4sj&v=2
http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xIuMf_y4sj&v=3
想要效果为V3，散点高度为0，在地球表面。通过visualMap区分点颜色及大小。

http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#visualMap-continuous.dimension官方文档上说visualMap里的dimension可以选择指定维度数据，以下为原文
其中每个列是一个维度，即 dimension。 例如 dimension 为 1 时，取第二列（即 23，23，545，23），映射到视觉元素上。

默认取 data 中最后一个维度。

### 在data中数据[经度，纬度，0，value]
在这样定义数据的时候,visualMap无效果，并没有取最后一个维度数据
fontSize: '20',

> 可以单独设置选中点的颜色，默认选中点就是默认这个点就设置成选中的颜色呗

我们这里有个需求是，地图上俩个点距离比较近，a显示在b的上面，通过option的确改变了b的凸显，但是b依然在a的下面，有什么属性或方法更改
http://echarts.baidu.com/examples/editor.html?c=custom-profit
No, I'm afraid it's not supported. You probably have to use the same data for two series to achieve this.
http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-line.markLine
Hi. What's the version of your SVG ECharts? I tried with the latest version and it's the same as canvas result.

Hi. According to the doc, `axisLabel` doesn't have an option for `opacity` and that's why `splitLine.opacity` can set `axisLabel`'s. On the other hand, axisLabel color should not be bound to splitLine. If you wish them to be the same, just set them to be the same color.
Hi. Please refer to the doc. There's no `title` under series, but it's under `option`, and can be an array.
I see,Thx .And it was added to echarts in 4.2.0? I found in 4.1.0,`splitLine.opaicty` can not control `axisLabel` 's opacity.
I'm not sure. But it's recommended not to rely on `splitLine.opaicty` if you wish to change `axisLabel`.

1. You should set `connectNulls: true` to make it connect nulls
2. You don't have `connectNulls` in your demo
3. It only connects from value to `null`, which means `[null, 1, null, 2]` will not have the line from the first data to `1`, but will connect between `1` and `2`.
You should have more than one element in `grid` to use it.
Seems to have something to do with clipPath. I'll check it out ASAP.

You may set [roam](http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-graph.roam) to be true. But I'm not quite sure what is the effect you want. Please go to GitHub website to upload an image to show me. Thanks!
@zhangchengshan It should be closed after the bug is fixed.

Hi. Are you using ECharts from npm or where is the js from? This problems seems to be related to less of some components of ECharts. Please provide more information so that we can help you find what's going on here.

Not quite sure, since there're some bugs to be fixed.
Can you try with 4.2.0rc versions in the release?
Please provide a working demo at http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html or http://jsfiddle.net . You may use setTimeout for the `fetchData` part.
你可以试试看~
You may add a series that doesn't contain data, but only to show legend.
Try `interval: 0`
@dogLovesToEatCabbage Would you like to make a pull request?
Could you please elaborate? I have two elements in the grid.

markline draws a line parallel to x-axis or y-axis, but a trend line is different.
Trend line shows whether the graph is going up or down or is it neutral

I see now how it should be done.

I should replace 'grid' by { gridIndex: 1} in convertToPixel and in comvertFromPixel

This then work as intended.

请问是否已重现该问题？或者是否需要提供更加详细的信息。
Hello Ovilia, I have update my question, please go through it and let me know if you need more info and yes, i had installed echarts, vue-echarts from npm.
ok，thanks.
What's the problem here?
What requirement do you mean?

Because the x value of the two series are not the same. The first one is `1544770701` and the second one is `1544770702`. But I think this should be improved so that all series are shown in tooltip when `trigger` is set to be `axis`.
What's your ECharts version? This seems to be an old bug, and please try with the latest version.
Please check your option by yourself. There's no way we can tell from the information you provide.
Hi. Here's an example. Not quite the same, but something you can try with. http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=x6Y0rsxTG5
Hi. The min in the demo is `-30`. What do you mean it cannot be negative?
Currently, you should calculate the data of this line by yourself, and add a line series to make it.

Please ask in vue-echarts repo.
If you use ECharts without Vue, it should be something like `import * as ECharts from 'echarts'`. But I'm not quite sure how it should be used with vue-echarts.
